desc: The basic talents defining a class.
name: base/class

desc: The various racial bonuses a character can have.
name: base/race

desc: Chant the glory of the Sun.
name: celestial/chants

desc: Bind the power of the Moon into circles at your feet.
name: celestial/circles

desc: Your devotion allows you to combat your foes with indomitable determination.
name: celestial/combat

desc: The moment of the Eclipse is the moment of Truth, when Sun and Moon are in tandem and the energies of the world hang in the balance. Intense focus allows the greatest Anorithils to harness these energies to unleash devastating forces...
name: celestial/eclipse

desc: Bind the brilliant powers into glyphs to trap your foes.
name: celestial/glyphs

desc: Your devotion grants you additional protection.
name: celestial/guardian

desc: Chant the glory of the Moon.
name: celestial/hymns

desc: Invoke the power of the light to heal and mend.
name: celestial/light

desc: Various celestial talents.
name: celestial/other

desc: Call the fury of the Stars and the Moon to destroy your foes.
name: celestial/star fury

desc: Summon the power of the Sun to burn your foes.
name: celestial/sun

desc: Stand between the darkness and the light, harnessing both.
name: celestial/twilight

desc: Manipulate the age of creatures you encounter.
name: chronomancy/Age Manipulation

desc: Miscellaneous Chronomancy effects.
name: chronomancy/Other

desc: Mastery of folding points in space.
name: chronomancy/Spacetime Folding

desc: Weave the threads of spacetime and correct the damage you've caused through your meddling.
name: chronomancy/Spacetime Weaving

desc: Control how fast objects and creatures move through spacetime.
name: chronomancy/Speed Control

desc: A blend of chronomancy and physical combat.
name: chronomancy/Temporal Combat

desc: Travel through time yourself, or send your foes into the future.
name: chronomancy/Time Travel

desc: Examine and alter the timelines that make up the spacetime continuum.
name: chronomancy/Timeline Threading

desc: Spacetime anomalies that can randomly occur when paradox is to high.
name: chronomancy/anomalies

desc: Allows you to glimpse the future, or become more aware of the present.
name: chronomancy/chronomancy

desc: Manipulate raw energy by addition or subtraction.
name: chronomancy/energy

desc: Call upon the force of gravity to crush, push, and pull your foes.
name: chronomancy/gravity

desc: Change and shape matter itself.
name: chronomancy/matter

desc: Create loopholes in the laws of spacetime.
name: chronomancy/paradox

desc: Harness the power of the demonic shadowflame.
name: corruption/Shadowflame

desc: Bring corruption and decay to all who oppose you.
name: corruption/blight

desc: Harness the power of blood, both your own and your foes'.
name: corruption/blood

desc: Harness the power of bones.
name: corruption/bone

desc: Curse your foes, hindering and crippling them.
name: corruption/curses

desc: Hex your foes, hindering and crippling them.
name: corruption/hexes

desc: Spell talents of the various horrors of the world.
name: corruption/horror spells

desc: Talents of the various entities of the world.
name: corruption/other

desc: Spread diseases to your foes.
name: corruption/plague

desc: Enhanced melee combat through the dark arts.
name: corruption/reaving combat

desc: Manipulate life force to feed your own dark powers.
name: corruption/sanguisuge

desc: Bring pain and destruction to the world.
name: corruption/scourge

desc: All the tools to torment your foes.
name: corruption/torment

desc: Touch the very essence of your victims.
name: corruption/vim

desc: Using darkness and a bit of magic, you manipulate the shadows.
name: cunning/ambush

desc: Teaches various talents to cripple your foes.
name: cunning/dirty fighting

desc: How to make your foes feel the pain.
name: cunning/lethality

desc: The knowledge of poisons and how to apply them to 'good' effects.
name: cunning/poisons

desc: Collection of known poisons.
name: cunning/poisons

desc: The use of ungentlemanly techniques.
name: cunning/scoundrel

desc: Blending magic and shadows.
name: cunning/shadow magic

desc: Allows the user to enter stealth.
name: cunning/stealth

desc: The knowledge of the dangers of the world, and how to best avoid them.
name: cunning/survival

desc: Tactical combat abilities.
name: cunning/tactical

desc: The knowledge of trap laying and assorted trickeries.
name: cunning/trapping

desc: Collection of known traps.
name: cunning/traps

desc: The things you surround yourself with soon wither away.
name: cursed/cursed aura

desc: You are wracked with the dark energies of the curse.
name: cursed/cursed form

desc: Invoke the powerful force of your will.
name: cursed/dark sustenance

desc: Harness the power of darkness to envelop your foes.
name: cursed/darkness

desc: Each day, you lift your weary body and begin the unending hunt.
name: cursed/endless hunt

desc: Use the fear that lies at the heart of your curse to attack the minds of your enemies.
name: cursed/fears

desc: Invoke the powerful force of your will.
name: cursed/force of will

desc: Enhance the power of you mind with gestures.
name: cursed/gestures

desc: All those in your sight must share your despair.
name: cursed/gloom

desc: Harness your shadows to their full potential.
name: cursed/one with shadows

desc: Track and kill your prey with single-minded focus.
name: cursed/predator

desc: Your hate becomes punishment in the minds of your foes.
name: cursed/punishments

desc: Let loose the hate that has grown within.
name: cursed/rampage

desc: Summon shadows from the darkness to aid you.
name: cursed/shadows

desc: Your weapon yearns for its next victim.
name: cursed/slaughter

desc: The battlefield is your home; death and confusion, your comfort.
name: cursed/strife
